title.rendered: Amadi Harry Excellent MD/CEO Hamrex Properties Gifts Wene Port Harcourt Plots of Land

content.rendered:
Port Harcourt fast-rising real estate and construction company; Hamrex Properties and Construction Limited gifts Wene Port Harcourt a plot of land.

To acknowledge his extraordinary feat whist trekking from Lagos to Port Harcourt in an ambitious bid to break the Guinness World Record. 

The CEO Amadi Harry Excellent in a statement said “We are giving you this plot of land to build your dream home not only to honor your hard work but also to send a powerful message to all young people – that relentless effort and determination lead to extraordinary outcomes.

Recall that a few days ago Hamrex Properties won an award as the most impactful real estate brand of the year

Congratulations Wene Port Harcourt
Thank you Hamrex Properties Limited
